citations.narrative:
The facility has been conducting regulated activity without a valid license by continuing to exhibit their animals (2 non-
human primates, Zoey and Tank) to the general public through Facebook pages after having received a “We Believe”
letter from the Animal Care office around Feb. 6, 2023, a call with office personnel on Feb. 8, a courtesy call with a field
inspector on Feb. 13, and an inspection report citing this same regulation on April 25, 2023. Additionally, documents for
licensure were sent by both mail and email to the facility. One of the pages (Monkey N around with Zoey and Tika) is
monetized, meaning that when viewers send stars, the person posting the video is paid.
No person shall operate as a dealer, exhibitor without a valid license, except persons who are exempt from the licensing
requirements under paragraph (a)(3) of this section.
The facility needs to obtain a USDA license or discontinue regulated activities.
No regulated activities may be conducted until a USDA license is obtained.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1)  Repeat
   
Requirements and application. 
The facility has been conducting regulated activity without a valid license by continuing to exhibit their animals (2 non-
human primates, Zoey and Tank) to the general public through Facebook pages after having received a “We Believe” 
letter from the Animal Care office around Feb. 6, 2023, a call with office personnel on Feb. 8, a courtesy call with a field 
inspector on Feb. 13, and an inspection report citing this same regulation on April 25, 2023. Additionally, documents for 
licensure were sent by both mail and email to the facility. One of the pages (Monkey N around with Zoey and Tika) is 
monetized, meaning that when viewers send stars, the person posting the video is paid. 
 
No person shall operate as a dealer, exhibitor without a valid license, except persons who are exempt from the licensing 
requirements under paragraph (a)(3) of this section. 
 
The facility needs to obtain a USDA license or discontinue regulated activities. 
 
No regulated activities may be conducted until a USDA license is obtained. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
